Text: Jesus, what a treasure. Is it any good? I've read all the books a long time ago. Didn't even know there were movies on PD James character.

Omg, I have been looking for separate movies and was despairing that I can't find any one...and here they are all!!! THANK YOU SOOOOOOOO MUCH to the uploader and all seeders!!! This torrent is a pure gem!

I, too, have been looking for these for some years. Thanks. Can't seem to connect, tho. Keep getting error message about problem connecting to tracker. Any advice? Other torrents on here are working for me. . . thanks.
